description.french: Obtenir tous les succès.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli achievement.
description.japanese: 全ての実績が取得した。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros.

description.french: Vaincre Louxuriant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Licarbusto.
description.japanese: 落葉の巨狼を撃破した。
description.spanish: Derrota al lobo de la fronda.

description.french: Vaincre Loss, les ailes brisées.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Loss, le Ali Spezzate
description.japanese: 断翼の空行者・ロスを撃破した。
description.schinese: 击败折翼的空行者·洛斯。
description.spanish: Derrota a Loss, Alas Rotas.
description.tchinese: 擊敗折翼的空行者·洛斯。

description.brazilian: Derrote Agus, Golias de Pyro e Aqil, Golias de Pyro.
description.english: Defeat Agus, the Pyro Goliath, Aqil, the Pyro Goliath.
description.french: Vaincre Agus et Aquil, les Pyro-Goliath.
description.german: Besiege Agus, den Pyro-Goliath, Aqil, den Pyro-Goliath.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Agus, il Goliath di Pyro e Aqil, il Goliath di Pyro.
description.japanese: 火の巨人・アグスと火の巨人・アキルを撃破した。
description.russian: Победите Агуса, Голиафа Пиро, Акила, Голиафа Пиро.
description.schinese: 击败火之巨人·阿古斯与火之巨人·阿基尔。
description.spanish: Derrota a Agus y a Aqil, los Goliat de Pyro.
description.tchinese: 擊敗火之巨人·阿古斯與火之巨人·阿基爾。

description.french: Vaincre la Guide, la lune d’ombre.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Guida, la Luna d'Ombra.
description.japanese: 闇月・ガイダーを撃破した。
description.spanish: Derrota a Guía, la Luna Sombría.

description.french: Vaincre Karin, le primat occulte.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Karin, la Maga Occulta.
description.japanese: 謎の魔法師・カリンを撃破した。
description.spanish: Derrota a Karin, la Archimaga.

description.french: Vaincre Ésée, la Transcendante.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Eseus, la Trascendente.
description.japanese: 偉大なる存在・イセウスを撃破した。
description.schinese: 击败伟大的存在·伊修斯。
description.spanish: Derrota a Eseus, la Trascendente.
description.tchinese: 擊敗偉大的存在·伊修斯。

description.french: Vaincre Ésée, l’Éternelle.
description.italian: Sconfigg Eseus, l'Eterna.
description.japanese: 永劫・イセウスを撃破した。
description.spanish: Derrota a Eseus, la Eterna.

description.french: Vaincre toutes les entités puissantes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutte le entità poderose.
description.japanese: 全ての強敵を撃破した。
description.spanish: Derrota a todas las existencias poderosas.

description.french: Vaincre tous les boss.
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti i boss.
description.japanese: 全てのボスを撃破した。
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los jefes.

description.brazilian: Obtenha todos os fragmentos da folha divina e da flor divina.
description.english: Collect all shards of Divine Leaf and Divine Flower.
description.french: Obtenir tous les fragments de feuille divine et de fleur divine.
description.german: Sammle alle Splitter des Göttlichen Blattes und der Göttlichen Blume.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i frammenti della foglia divina e del fiore divino.
description.japanese: 全ての神性の花と神性の葉の欠片を手に入れた。
description.koreana: 신성한 잎과 꽃 조각을 전부 수집하세요.
description.russian: Соберите все фрагменты Божественного листа и Божественного цветка.
description.schinese: 收集所有神性之花与神性之叶的碎片。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los fragmentos de la hoja divina y la flor divina.
description.tchinese: 收集所有神性之花與神性之葉的碎片。

description.french: Obtenir tous les glyphes primordiaux.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i Glifi Primordiali.
description.japanese: 全ての源語ルーンを手に入れた。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los glifos primigenios.

description.brazilian: Obtenha todos os glifos de Shenlong.
description.french: Obtenir tous les glyphes de Shenlong.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i Glifi di Shenlong.
description.japanese: 全ての龍語ルーンを手に入れた。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los glifos de Shenlong.

description.french: Remplir l’intégralité du bestiaire.
description.italian: Completa il bestiario.
description.japanese: 怪物図鑑が完成した。
description.spanish: Completa el bestiario.

description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as armas e armaduras.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les armes et armures.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le armi e le armature.
description.japanese: 全ての武器と防具を手に入れた。
description.spanish: Consigue todas las armas y armaduras.

description.french: Obtenir tous les accessoires.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli accessori.
description.japanese: 全ての装飾品を手に入れた。
description.spanish: Consigue todos los accesorios.

description.french: Apprendi tutte le arti segrete.
description.italian: Apprendi tutte le arti segrete.
description.japanese: 全ての秘伝スキルが習得した。
description.spanish: Aprende todas las artes secretas.

description.brazilian: Prove todos os pratos de Engardin.
description.french: Goûter à tous les plats d’Engardin.
description.italian: Assaggia tutti i piatti di Engardin.
description.japanese: 庭園の料理を全て味わった。
description.spanish: Prueba todos los platos de Engardin.

description.french: Atteindre le niveau 99.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello 99.
description.japanese: レベル99に到達した。
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel 99.

description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as habilidades e remanescências e alcance o nível 99.
description.english: Obtain all abilities and Afterimages, and reach level 99.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les capacités, Rémanences, et atteindre le niveau 99.
description.german: Erhalte alle Fähigkeiten sowie Nachbilder und erreiche Stufe 99.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le abilità e le immagini residue e raggiungi il livello 99.
description.japanese: 全てのスキルとアフターイメージを手に入れた。
description.koreana: 레벨 99에 도달하고 모든 기술과 잔상을 수집하세요.
description.russian: Получите все способности и реминисценции; достигните 99 уровня.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las habilidades y Remanentes y alcanza el nivel 99.

displayName.japanese: マネー・フォー・ナッシング

description.brazilian: Compre todos os itens da loja.
description.french: Acheter tous les articles disponibles en boutique.
description.italian: Acquista tutti gli oggetti del negozio.
description.japanese: ショップで販売しているアイテムを全て購入した。
description.koreana: 상점에서 구매 가능한 모든 것을 구매하세요.
description.schinese: 购买所有商店出售的道具。
description.spanish: Compra todos los objetos de las tiendas.
description.tchinese: 購買所有商店出售的道具。

description.brazilian: Ative todas as Confluências dos Fluxos.
description.french: Activer tous les Confluents des flots.
description.italian: Attiva tutte le Confluenze del Flusso.
description.japanese: 全ての魂脈の結目を開放した。
description.spanish: Activa todas las confluencias de la Corriente.

description.brazilian: Testemunhe a longa jornada de Stanley e Levine.
description.english: Witness the long journey of Stanley and Levine.
description.french: Être témoin du long périple de Stanley et Levine.
description.german: Werde Zeuge der langen Reise von Stanley und Levin.
description.italian: Fai da testimone al lungo viaggio di Stanley e Levine.
description.japanese: スタンリーとレビンの長旅を見届けた。
description.russian: Станьте свидетелем долгого пути Стенли и Левина.
description.schinese: 见证史丹利和莱文的长途旅行。
description.spanish: Sé testigo del viaje de Stanley y Levine.
description.tchinese: 見證史丹利和萊文的長途旅行。

description.french: Être témoin du sort de Nicole.
description.italian: Fai da testimone al destino di Nicole.
description.japanese: ニコルの遺物を手に入れた。
description.spanish: Sé testigo del destino de Nicole.

description.brazilian: Testemunhe o fim eterno de Ethan.
description.english: Witness the endless end of Ethan.
description.french: Être témoin de la fin éternelle d’Ethan.
description.german: Werde Zeuge von Ethans endlosem Ende.
description.italian: Fai da testimone alla fine eterna di Ethan.
description.japanese: イーサンの終わりのない結末を見届けた。
description.spanish: Sé testigo del final de Ethan.

description.brazilian: Testemunhe a grande aventura de Karsa e Brenda.
description.english: Witness the great adventure of Karsa and Brenda.
description.french: Être témoin de l’aventure épique de Karsa et Brenda.
description.german: Erlebe das große Abenteuer von Karsa und Brendo.
description.italian: Fai da testimone alla grande avventura di Karsa e Brenda.
description.japanese: カルサとブランダの偉大なる冒険を見届けた。
description.russian: Станьте свидетелем великого приключения Карсы и Бренды.
description.spanish: Sé testigo de la gran aventura de Karsa y Brend.

description.brazilian: Em nome da máscara, da espada e da auréola.
description.english: In the name of the Mask, Sword, and Halo.
description.french: Au nom du masque, de l’épée, et de l’auréole.
description.german: Im Namen der Maske, des Schwertes und des Heiligenscheins.
description.italian: Nel nome della maschera, della spada e dell'aureola.
description.japanese: 傩面と、剣と、光の名において。
description.russian: Во имя Маски, Меча и Ореола.
description.spanish: En nombre de la máscara, la espada y el halo.

description.brazilian: Testemunhe o último eco de Rosalia.
description.english: Witness the last Echo of Rosalia.
description.french: Être témoin du dernier écho de Rosalia.
description.german: Werde Zeuge von Rosalias letztem Echo.
description.italian: Fai da testimone all'ultima eco di Rosalia.
description.japanese: ロザリアの最後の残響を手に入れた。
description.schinese: 见证罗莎莉亚最后的回响。
description.spanish: Sé testigo del último eco de Rosalia.
description.tchinese: 見證羅莎莉亞最後的迴響。

description.french: Ne pas interrompre le « travail » d’une certaine personne.
description.italian: Non disturbare il "lavoro" degli altri.
description.japanese: 人の「仕事」を邪魔してはいけない。
description.spanish: No molestes a los demás mientras «trabajan».

description.brazilian: Testemunhe o apagar de um sol.
description.english: Witness the fading of a sun.
description.french: Être témoin de la disparition d’un soleil.
description.german: Werde Zeuge des Verblassens einer Sonne.
description.italian: Fai da testimone alla morte di un sole.
description.japanese: 一つの太陽の消滅を見届けた。
description.spanish: Sé testigo del desvanecimiento del sol.

description.french: Découvrez le goût du bonheur.
description.italian: Prova qual è il sapore della felicità.
description.japanese: 幸せな味を味わった。
description.spanish: Prueba el sabor de la felicidad.

description.brazilian: Que nossos caminhos se cruzem novamente em breve...
description.english: May our paths cross soon once again...
description.french: Puissent nos chemins se recroiser dans un avenir proche...
description.german: Mögen sich unsere Wege bald wieder kreuzen ...
description.italian: Che i nostri cammini possano incrociarsi nuovamente...
description.japanese: いつかまた会える日まで……
description.russian: Да сойдутся вскоре наши пути вновь...
description.spanish: Espero que nuestros caminos vuelvan a cruzarse...

description.french: Où est mon esprit ?
description.italian: Dov'è finita la mia mente?
description.japanese: 心はどこに？
description.spanish: ¿Dónde está mi mente?

description.english: Down in a hall and I don't know if I can be saved.
description.french: Loin sous la terre, qui sait si je peux être sauvé ?
description.italian: Giù in questo buco, non posso essere salvato.
description.japanese: 穴に降りて、私は救われるのか分からない。
description.koreana: 궁전 속에서 나는 살아남을 수 있을까?
description.russian: Глубоко в Чертогах, и не знаю, буду ли спасена.
description.spanish: Bajo un pabellón y no sé si tiene salvación.

description.brazilian: O destino está escrito em uma tábua.
description.english: Along the Tablet, seared by fate.
description.french: Le destin est marqué le long de la tablette.
description.german: Entlang der Tafel, vom Schicksal gezeichnet.
description.italian: Il destino è segnato da una tavoletta.
description.japanese: 碑文に刻まれた宿命を沿って。
description.spanish: El destino está escrito en la tablilla.

description.brazilian: O fogo está fora de controle...
description.english: This fire is out of control...
description.french: Ce feu est hors de contrôle...
description.italian: Questo fuoco è fuori controllo...
description.japanese: この炎は制御不能だ……
description.spanish: El fuego está fuera de control...

description.english: ...the hardest part of this is leaving you.
description.french: Le plus difficile, c’est de te quitter.
description.german: ... am schwierigsten ist, dich zu verlassen.
description.italian: ...la parte più difficile è lasciarti.
description.japanese: ……一番辛いのは、君たちを残していくこと。
description.spanish: Lo más difícil es dejarte ir.

description.english: We're out on the road again.
description.french: De nouveau sur la route.
description.italian: Di nuovo sulla strada.
description.japanese: 私たちはまた旅立つんだ。
description.spanish: Partimos de viaje otra vez.

description.brazilian: Doces sonhos... são feitos de quê?
description.english: Sweet dreams... are made of this?
description.french: Les rêves sont... faits de cela ?
description.italian: "Sweet dreams... are made of this?"
description.japanese: 甘い夢は……こういうものなのか？
description.spanish: ¿De qué están hechos los sueños?

description.brazilian: Engardin está condenada e não há nada que eu possa fazer.
description.english: Engadin is doomed and there's nothing I can do.
description.french: Engardin est perdu, et je ne peux rien y faire.
description.german: Engardin ist dem Untergang geweiht und es gibt nichts, was ich tun kann.
description.italian: "Engardin is doomed and there's nothing I can do."
description.japanese: 庭園は滅び、出来ることは何もないのだ。
description.koreana: 엔가르딘은 망했고 내가 할 수 있는 건 없어.
description.russian: Энгардин обречен, и я ничего не могу поделать.
description.schinese: 园庭步向终末，而我已无能为力。
description.spanish: Es el fin de Engardin y no puedo hacer nada.
description.tchinese: 園庭步向終末，而我已無能為力。

description.french: Brille donc, folle fleur.
description.italian: Splendi su di me, o folle fiore.
description.japanese: 狂気の花よ、輝け。
description.spanish: Brilla, flor alocada.

description.french: Téléphone rouge, ou téléphone bleu ?
description.italian: Telefono rosso o telefono blu?
description.japanese: 赤い電話か、それとも青い電話か。
description.schinese: 红色电话，还是蓝色电话？
description.spanish: ¿Teléfono rojo o teléfono azul?
description.tchinese: 紅色電話，還是藍色電話？

displayName.japanese: 下切りではない、下キック
displayName.koreana: 포고 점프는 다른 데 가서 해

description.french: On garde ça pour la suite !
description.german: Heb dir das für das Sequel auf!
description.italian: Conserviamolo per il seguito!
description.japanese: 新作に残しておこう！
description.spanish: ¡Eso déjatelo para la secuela!

description.brazilian: Cause 666 de dano em um único golpe.
description.english: Deal 666 damage in one single hit.
description.french: Infliger 666 points de dégâts en un seul coup.
description.german: Verursache 666 Schaden mit einem einzigen Treffer.
description.italian: Infliggi 666 punti danno con un solo colpo.
description.japanese: 一撃で666ダメージを与えた。
description.spanish: Inflige 666 de daño con un solo golpe.

description.french: Effectuer un saut de la foi.
description.italian: Effettua un salto della fede.
description.japanese: イーグルダイブを一回成功した。
description.spanish: Da un salto de fe.

description.brazilian: Derrote um inimigo com um Bastião de ferro aprimorado.
description.english: Defeat an enemy by performing an enhanced Iron Bastion.
description.french: Vaincre un ennemi en effectuant un Bastion de fer amélioré.
description.german: Besiege einen Gegner, indem du eine verbesserte Eiserne Bastion ausführst.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un nemico effettuando un Bastione di Ferro potenziato.
description.japanese: 強化された「鉄壁」で敵を撃破した。
description.russian: Победите врага с помошью усиленного Железного бастиона.
description.schinese: 成功以强化的「铁壁」击杀敌人。
description.spanish: Derrota a un enemigo con Fortaleza férrea mejorada.
description.tchinese: 成功以強化的「鐵壁」擊殺敵人。
